pinyin: shen1 ti3 zhi4 liang4 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: China Adult Constitute Standard Guide has certain applicative value.
sentences.chinese: 《中国成年人体质测定标准指南》具有应用价值。

sentences.english: Her delicate constitution disinclined her from such an arduous job.
sentences.chinese: 她纤弱的体质使得她不欲担任如此艰钜的工作。

sentences.english: Conclusion China Adult Constitute Standard Guide have applicative value.
sentences.chinese: 结论《中国成年人体质测定标准指南》具有应用价值。

sentences.english: He decided to overcome his physical weaknesses through exercise and hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他决定通过锻炼和重体力劳动来克服体质的病弱。

sentences.english: Debate has raged over whether taking supplements might provide the body with an extra boost.
sentences.chinese: 摄取补品是否能够增强体质的争论已经炽热化。

sentences.english: The symptoms of repletion heat patterns as fact are developed from the foundation of vacuity heat patterns in constitution.
sentences.chinese: 实热证的表现，其实是在虚热体质的基础上演变而来。

sentences.english: These manifestations are usually seen in patients at the rehabilitating stage or with weak constitution.
sentences.chinese: 常见于轻病，或恢复期患者，亦可见于体质虚弱者。

sentences.english: Barium sulfate as an extender pigment is widely used in paint.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸钡作为体质颜料广泛应用于涂料中。

sentences.english: Phlegm basic theories of Chinese medicine physical theory is an important part.
sentences.chinese: 痰湿体质学说是中医基础理论的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: He was of a delicate mind and body, and he died at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 他心性敏感而体质柔弱，很早就过世了。

sentences.english: Women who reported playing video games reported greater levels of depression and poorer overall health than non-gamers.
sentences.chinese: 女性玩家有更高等级的抑郁和更差的体质。

sentences.english: The girl's delicacy [delicate health] has always worried her parents.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩纤弱的体质一直使她的父母感到忧虑。

sentences.english: He reported occasional mild palmar hyperhidrosis of his left hand and had a family history of atopy.
sentences.chinese: 他宣称左手掌偶有多汗的情形，家人有异位性体质。

sentences.english: These long-buried bones tell us about the physical build and eating habits of dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 这些长埋的骨头告诉我们恐龙的体质和饮食习惯。

sentences.english: He perceives his delicate constitution , and the necessity of treating him tolerably.
sentences.chinese: 他看到他娇弱的体质，有必要对他宽厚些。

sentences.english: 16 your eyes saw my unformed body.
sentences.chinese: 我未成形的体质，你的眼早已看见了。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
a person who is in poor health cannot handle sth so strong as a tonic
spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
to take care of (sb's health)/to nurse
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
